VLAD2.original: Ram the shop keeper's ~R~van~s~ until he stops.
VLAD2.translated: 撞击店主的~R~面包车~s~将其逼停。

VLAD2.original: Press ~INPUT_PHONE_TAKE_OUT~ to display phone. Press ~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~ to instantly read new message.
VLAD2.translated: 按~INPUT_PHONE_TAKE_OUT~拿出手机，按~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~可以直接查看未读消息。

VLAD2.original: Press ~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~ and select Delete to wipe the message, or press and hold ~INPUT_PHONE_PUT_AWAY~ to exit.
VLAD2.translated: 按~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~后选择「删除」可以删除短信，按~INPUT_PHONE_PUT_AWAY~退出。

VLAD2.original: Hold ~INPUT_VEH_CIN_CAM~ to focus the camera on the target vehicle.
VLAD2.translated: 按住~INPUT_VEH_CIN_CAM~将镜头对准目标车辆。

VLAD2.original: The envelope icon above the radar is displayed when you have a new text message. This will fade slightly when it is read.
VLAD2.translated: 小地图上方的信封图标表示你收到了短信，阅读后就会消失。

VLAD2.original: ~r~The shop keeper was spooked and escaped out the front.
VLAD2.translated: ~r~店主受到了惊吓，从前门逃跑了。
